tiers.title: Non-Profit
tiers.benefits: Access to basic events and trainings.
tiers.conditions: Company must be a non-profit organization to qualify for this tier.

tiers.title: Bronze
tiers.benefits: Access to basic events and trainings. Basic advertising and a card on the website.
tiers.conditions: No conditions. Any local company can join.

tiers.title: Silver
tiers.benefits: Access to events, trainings, social gatherings and more. Advanced advertising, networking, and more opportunities to engage with the community as a whole.
tiers.conditions: Company must have at least 20 full time employees.

tiers.title: Gold
tiers.benefits: All of the benefits of Silver and below, as well as business health packages, strong advertising at both chamber of commerce gatherings and public events, and more.
tiers.conditions: Company must have at least 100 full time employees.
